U

ui - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.Client
User interface reference
UI - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.client.view
UI stands for User Interface and it is an abstract class containing methods used by CLI and Gui related to users game experience.
UI(Client) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.UI
Constructor of the class that binds UI and Client to which it is related.
